definition: to beat/to strike/to hit/to break/to type/to mix up/to build/to fight/to fetch/to make/to tie up/to issue/to shoot/to calculate/to play (a game)/since/from
to hit (the mark)/to be hit by/to suffer/to win (a prize, a lottery)

sentences.english: He can play centre-back or either full-back.
sentences.chinese: 他可以打中后卫和任何一个位置的边路后卫。

sentences.english: And to accept that - to quote him - "it shoots, it hits".
sentences.chinese: 引用作者的话，便是，箭在射，箭打中了靶心。

sentences.english: He accidentally trod on her foot.
sentences.chinese: 他意外走火打中了自己的脚。

sentences.english: Several bullets struck the log-house, but not one entered;
sentences.chinese: 有几发子弹打中了木屋子，但是没有穿透进来。

sentences.english: The hunter missed the last two shots.
sentences.chinese: 那个猎手最后两枪没打中。

sentences.english: If it had hit them, they could have all been killed.
sentences.chinese: 如果当时真打中他们，他们可能全都一命呜呼。

sentences.english: The words hit June like a pebble, in the ribs.
sentences.chinese: 这些话就像鹅孵石一样打中琼的胸膛。

sentences.english: He fired at the wolf, but missed it .
sentences.chinese: 他朝那只狼开了一枪，但是没有打中。

sentences.english: Jack shot at the deer but missed.
sentences.chinese: 杰克朝鹿开了一枪，但是没有打中。

sentences.english: She aimed at the target but missed it.
sentences.chinese: 她瞄准目标射击，但没打中。

sentences.english: The words hit June like a pebble , in the ribs.
sentences.chinese: 这些话就象鹅孵石一样打中琼的胸膛。

sentences.english: The man missed the shot, and the dove's life was saved.
sentences.chinese: 猎人没有打中，鸽子的生命得到了挽救。
使用走壁奇袭攻撃累计打中敌人50回。

sentences.english: He shot at the bird, but missed it.
sentences.chinese: 他对着鸟开枪，但没打中。

sentences.english: The second hit his wife's calf.
sentences.chinese: 第二枪打中了她妻子的小腿。

sentences.english: The wild pitch hit the batter.

definition: to strike back/to beat back/to counterattack
to rake with machine gunfire/to strafe/to machine-gun down
to hit with a piercing blow
to stay out of (hot water, trouble, awkward situation etc)/to avoid (sb)
dominant/controlling/strong/opposite: weak, yielding 弱受/to take by storm (military)
